description.value: Some centaurs grow up or otherwise move to cities with stone, or environments with harsh grounds. These centaurs, called jennets amongst centaurs, have learned to walk more precisely, masking their clops. This prevents scaring off animals or other creatures with their roaring charges. This, along with their developed charm, makes them more popular amongst other bestial races and animals alike, especially as entertainers.

system.classDetails:
Jennet Centaur Traits

  • Compatibility: Bestial (or Hominid with Alternate Compatibility)
  • Attribute Increase: Your Presence increases by 1.
  • Proficiency: You have proficiency in one of the following:
    • Presence (Perform)
    • Presence (Persuasion)
    • The Entertainment Trade
  • Gliding Hooves: @Compendium[undertaking-chrystalis.abilities.CC4YCXH228AXY2R1]{Gliding Hooves}
  • Beast Buddy: @Compendium[undertaking-chrystalis.abilities.DS58ZSSBV0ZM323G]{Beast Buddy}
  • *Alternate Compatibility: You can choose to instead have the Hominid compatibility for the sake of mix-racing, gaining the following traits.
    • Proficiency: You have proficiency in Presence (Persuasion).
